name: BATTLE AGE!
description:
• This game was developed in one week for the Epic MegaJam 2020 .
  • Theme - It's been a long time - but we're not done yet.

This game is about WAR! 

You have to defeat all your enemies in game level.

You can gather your ally by resuce them form the enemy.

Every level player have special skill and special weapon to use.

Gameplay Instructions

Keyboard & Mouse
W, A, S, D => for move in any direction
Left Click => Attack
Q => Switch between main and sub-weapon
Spacebar => Use skill
Shift => Roll for dodge attack and projectile

Gamepad / Joystick
Left Analog => Move in any direction
A button => Attack
B button => Dodge
R1 / RB => Switch between main and sub-weapon
L1 / LB => Use skill
